stories.description: getDepositAllCodes() with 100% protocol investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositAllCodes() with 0.1% protocol investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositAllCodes() with 100% pool investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositAllCodes() with 0.9% pool investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositAllCodes() with 0 investment limit (mode=number)
getDepositAllCodes() with investment limit (less than the deposit amount) (mode=number)
getDepositAllCodes() with investment limit (more than the deposit amount) (mode=number)
getWithdrawAllCodes() with 100% protocol investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositSomeCodes() with 100% protocol investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositSomeCodes() with 0.1% protocol investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositSomeCodes() with 100% pool investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositSomeCodes() with 0.9% pool investment limit (mode=pct)
getDepositSomeCodes() with 0 investment limit (mode=number)
getDepositSomeCodes() with investment limit (less than the deposit amount) (mode=number)
getDepositSomeCodes() with investment limit (more than the deposit amount) (mode=number)
getWithdrawSomeCodes() with 100% protocol investment limit (mode=pct)
getHarvestSomeCodes() should harvest specific amount of reward tokens to underlying
getHarvestAllCodes() should harvest all reward tokens to underlying
getClaimRewardTokenCode() should be able claim reward tokens
getStakeAllCodes() should stake all liquidity pool tokens
getStakeSomeCodes() should stake successfully
getUnStakeAllCodes() should unstake all available staking balance
getUnStakeSomeCodes() should unstake successfully
getUnstakeAndWithdrawAllCodes() should unstake and withdraw all available balance
getUnstakeAndWithdrawSomeCodes() should unstake and withdraw successfully
getUnderlyingTokens() should return same underlying tokens as there in lp contracts
calculateAmountInLPToken() should return amount in Lp token equivalent for specified deposit amount
getPoolValue() should return the pool value of lp contract
getLiquidityPoolToken() should return liquidity pool token address
getSomeAmountInToken() should return equivalent value of underlying token for given amount of lpToken
getAllAmountInToken() should return value in underlying token for all the lpTokens held
isRedeemableAmountSufficient() should return false if lp token redeem amt > balance in underlying tokens
isRedeemableAmountSufficient() should return true if lp token redeem amt < balance in underlying tokens
calculateRedeemableLPTokenAmount() should return the redeemable lp token amount on the basis of lp token balance
calculateRedeemableLPTokenAmountStake() should return the redeemable lp token amount on the basis of stake balance
isRedeemableAmountSufficientStake() should return true if lp token redeem amt < stake balance in underlying tokens
getAllAmountInTokenStake() should return value in underlying token for all the lpTokens held
getUnclaimedRewardTokenAmount() should return unclaim reward tokens

adapterStandloneStories.description: [canStake()] - should return whether stake is allowed or not
[setRewardToken()] - Operator should be able to set valid reward token address
[setRewardToken()] - Non-operator shouldn't be able to set reward token address
[setLiquidityPoolToStakingVault()] - Operator should be able to map liquidity pool to staking pool
[setLiquidityPoolToStakingVault()] - Non-Operator should be able to map liquidity pool to staking pool
